channel.title: Help with compiling please
channel.description:
Ok Guys I really need to fix this i'm coding my server and I just had this come up suddenly first time this happens to me so if you could help it would be great!!!!
Here is my compiler...
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" [url=http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/...]http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/...[/url] :end echo Finished! pause exit
Here is the error I get :'(
[font=courier new][size=x-small]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options[/size][/font] [font=courier new][size=x-small]Finished! Press any key to continue . .[/size][/font]

item.title: Help with compiling please
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Ok Guys I really need to fix this i’m coding my server and I just had this come up suddenly first time this happens to me so if you could help it would be great!!!

Here is my compiler…

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is
about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Here is the error I get :’(

[font=courier new][size=x-small]javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options[/size][/font]
[font=courier new][size=x-small]Finished!
Press any key to continue . .[/size][/font]

Read full topic
